title: Two bob mermaid
creator_credit: Core Films, Antonia Barnard and Darlene Johnson
brief_description: In this visually stunning short film set in the 1950s, a fair-skinned Aboriginal girl gains access to the local swimming pool where Aboriginal people are legally denied access (Source: Australian Screen)
